Freelance Work

Python Tutor

May, 2021 - Current

Description

During my time pursuing a Masters Degree, I discovered my passion for tutoring individuals in Python. I had the opportunity to connect computer science theory with practical applications, helping students grasp key concepts and develop their coding skills.

Responsibilities

  • Catered to individual needs, providing tailored Python tutoring sessions.

  • Explained fundamental concepts, including for and while loops, functions, and classes.

  • Explored more advanced topics such as data structures and algorithms, broadening students' understanding of Python programming.

  • Showcased practical applications through engaging coding puzzles puzzles, like FizzBuzz.

  • Provided feedback on students' code, helping them improve their coding style.

  • Offered advice on project structure and coding best practices.
